channel.title: CVE Feed for CodexThemes -- TheGem (Elementor)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CodexThemes -- TheGem (Elementor)

item.title: CVE-2023-32237|2024-08-06T14:35:24.222Z -- codexthemes -- thegem%20%28elementor%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CodexThemes TheGem (Elementor), CodexThemes TheGem (WPBakery) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects TheGem (Elementor): from n/a before 5.8.1.1; TheGem (WPBakery): from n/a before 5.8.1.1.
